subject: Doping (Sports)
Football
lead_paragraph: The N.F.L. sack leader, Robert Mathis of the Indianapolis Colts, was suspended for four games for violating the league’s policy on performance-enhancing drugs.
snippet: The N.F.L. sack leader, Robert Mathis of the Indianapolis Colts, was suspended for four games for violating the league’s policy on performance-enhancing drugs.
